with-starship-config.description: if false, do not use starship, or use default config or mount `~/.config/starship.yaml`

with-sheldon-config.description: if false, do not use sheldon, or use default config or mount `~/.config/sheldon/plugins.yaml`

with-some-tools.description: if false, do not install zsh, git, sudo, exa, ripgrep and so on

overwrite-zshrc.description: if false, do not overwrite `~/.zshrc` (append only)
